name: ojb's Pandora's Box Swaps Only
description:
Upon starting a new game, this mod will refresh the run until you have a seed where the boss swap is a guaranteed Pandora's Box. NOTE: This mod includes a patch that will ALWAYS guarantee the full 4 Neow bonuses, even if you did not complete the previous run.

 It is worth noting that the mod will try 200 times to roll a random seed with the Pandora's Box swap. This will eventually be configurable, but as of right now it's a reasonable safety precaution. Should your final seed not be a pandora's box, check to make sure you have it unlocked, and if you do, you probably need to abandon run and try again (you got extremely unlucky to hit like < 1% odds).

This mod is under construction and may not be stable.
